content:
Hi Hans

Stupid user question!!
Trying to run this wonderful thing with an R01 message. Where is this documented? Loaded the java and extensions and I think I'm ready to go
@Hans Buitendijk we're working on trying to convert from v2 to US-Core, we haven't found other examples of folks doing this. Do you know of any? Also see @J Karp 's question above

@Alex Goel : I'm not aware of anybody specifically mapping v2 to US Core, but when you take the general v2 to FHIR mappings being defined, that would cover US Core as the mappings are at the standards level, not the implementation guide level at this stage.

@J Karp : The general documentation is here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/v2-to-fhir/branches/master/index.html, while the source mapping tables are defined initially here before they land in GitHub: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PaFYPSSq4oplTvw_4OgOn6h2Bs_CMvCAU9CqC4tPBgk/edit#gid=1930219638. For ORU_R01, the latest is here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gHK6_PFyr7PXns7wLDs0LSLsbjm0x-4bWUu3crXMKMI/edit#gid=0.
